message.content:
To align a row of divs to the right using flex in CSS, you can use the `justify-content` property with the value `flex-end`. Here's an example: HTML: ```html
1
2
3
4
``` CSS: ```css .flex-container { display: flex; /* Set the container to a flex context */ justify-content: flex-end; /* Align items in the container to the end (right) */ } ``` In this example, the `.flex-container` class is set as a flex context with `display: flex;`. The `justify-content: flex-end;` property aligns all child divs to the right side of the container.
